external_games.name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Tatsuya Epilogue

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Tatsuya Epilogue
summary: Fast forward two years to the future and see how life has changed for you and Tatsuya. While you've never been more in love, you're not quite as far along in the relationship as you'd hoped. After a romantic date though, your life changes forever. Can an old threat bring promises of a new, brighter future?
